My @basecamp stickers finally arrived. From now on a mandatory sticker on every laptop in my team

1121911015065604097.text: I finished @dhh and @jasonfried ‘s it doesn’t have to be crazy at work and it is amazing. I wish I could go back in time and give my younger self this book.

1122892043121041408.text:
Growing up, we're told to look both way before crossing the street. These days, we only look one way: down (at our phones). 

I made a video about that:pic.twitter.com/Lu9EZrEvh9

1121773341935853568.text:
Perfect example of one of the darker sides of "workism":

The omnipresent "do what you love, and it's not work" ethos becomes an excuse to pay people with purpose—which often means not paying them much, at all.

via @BrendanNyhanhttps://twitter.com/MattGrossmann/status/1121751119741497344 …

1122106565941764097.text: I can’t recommend this book enough. @jasonfried @dhhpic.twitter.com/0hUHQNenX6

1121774227668000768.text:
The Times' CorePower yoga takedown showed the same thing.

The company is weaponizing ppl's obsession with callings and meaning, by urging vulnerable young workers to sacrifice pay for purpose, in a brazen MLM schemehttps://www.nytimes.com/2019/04/06/style/corepower-yoga-teacher-training.html …

1122923709885554693.text: We're collecting questions for a mailbag episode! If you want to ask @jasonfried, @dhh, or someone else at @basecamp a question, leave a voicemail at (708) 628-7850!

1120782155980922881.text: I wrote off @BestBuy several years ago, but listened to @profgalloway talk about their CEO with @karaswisher this morning. What a run. Nearly 4X’d the stock price of what most thought was a walking dead company.
